Name.markdownDescription:

Type: String

Authorized.markdownDescription:
Whether the channel is authorized.

---

Required: No  
Type: Boolean  
Update requires: No interruption

LatencyMode.markdownDescription:
Channel latency mode.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: NORMAL | LOW  
Update requires: No interruption

Type.description: Channel type, which determines the allowable resolution and bitrate. If you exceed the allowable resolution or bitrate, the stream probably will disconnect immediately.
Type.markdownDescription:
Channel type, which determines the allowable resolution and bitrate. If you exceed the allowable resolution or bitrate, the stream probably will disconnect immediately.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Allowed Values: STANDARD | BASIC  
Update requires: No interruption

Tags.description: A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.
Tags.markdownDescription:
A list of key-value pairs that contain metadata for the asset model.

---

Required: No  
Type: Array  
Update requires: No interruption

RecordingConfigurationArn.description: Recording Configuration ARN. A value other than an empty string indicates that recording is enabled. Default: "" (recording is disabled).
RecordingConfigurationArn.markdownDescription:
Recording Configuration ARN. A value other than an empty string indicates that recording is enabled. Default: "" (recording is disabled).

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^$|arn:aws:ivs:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:recording-configuration/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

Arn.description: Channel ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.
Arn.markdownDescription:
Channel ARN is automatically generated on creation and assigned as the unique identifier.

---

Required: No  
Type: String  
Minimum Length: 1  
Maximum Length: 128  
Pattern: ^arn:aws:ivs:[a-z0-9-]+:[0-9]+:channel/[a-zA-Z0-9-]+$  
Update requires: No interruption

PlaybackUrl.markdownDescription:
Channel Playback URL.

Required: No

Update requires: No interruption

IngestEndpoint.description: Channel ingest endpoint, part of the definition of an ingest server, used when you set up streaming software.
